body_html:
@girving no, the documentation reads: labels: Each row labels[i] must be a valid probability distribution or all zeros. My data does forfill this condition. (i.e. in cases where a valid probability distribution is not given, all are zero). However, changing the documentation to labels: Each row labels[i] must be a valid probability distribution. might be a solution.

Edit: Sry, looked at old documentation. The documentation already is changed in current master.

body:
@girving no, the documentation reads: `labels: Each row labels[i] must be a valid probability distribution or all zeros.` My data does forfill this condition. (i.e. in cases where a valid probability distribution is not given, all are zero). However, changing the documentation to `labels: Each row labels[i] must be a valid probability distribution.` might be a solution.

Edit: Sry, looked at old documentation. The documentation already is changed in current master.
